SEARCH
Module UsefulSchoolPortal
Package files

Class FileWorker

java.lang.Object
files.FileWorker
public class FileWorker extends Object
The FileWorker class is the class that maintains the list of schools, the first file read by the program. The FileWorker class also contains methods used to modify data in files.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Daniel Santillan

  • Constructor Details

    • FileWorker

      public FileWorker()
      Default constructor

  • Method Details

    • makeFile

      public static void makeFile()
      The makeFile method creates the schoolList file. If the file does not exist (i.e., first time user is running the program), the file is set up.

    • writeSchool

      public static boolean writeSchool(School s)
      The writeSchool method writes in a school to the schoolList file. The name and the school's ID is written in to the file.
      Parameters:
      s - The school to write in
      Returns:
      Whether everything worked

    • readFile

      public static ArrayList<String> readFile(File f)
      The readFile method reads a file and returns the contents of the file as an ArrayList of type String.
      Parameters:
      f - The file to be read
      Returns:
      The contents of the file

    • readSchoolFile

      public static ArrayList<String> readSchoolFile()
      The readSchoolFile method reads the schoolList file in the class, using the readFile method from this class.
      Returns:
      The contents of the schoolList file

    • removeLine

      public static boolean removeLine(File f, int id)
      The removeLine method removes a line from a file by searching for a particular ID from the file and removing the line with that ID. This is helpful for removing users.
      Parameters:
      f - The file to search
      id - The ID with the line to delete
      Returns:
      Whether the removal was successful

    • removeLineByIndex

      public static boolean removeLineByIndex(File f, int forgetIndex)
      The removeLineByIndex method removes a line from a file through the index. The contents at that index are removed from the file.
      Parameters:
      f - The file
      forgetIndex - The index to delete
      Returns:
      Whether the method ran smoothly

    • toString

      public String toString()
      This is the toString method for this class.
